text: [Music]
this is the new BlackBerry motion I've
been using it for a week and this is
what I think about
so the BlackBerry motion is a device
that it's meant for business people for
people who want to put productivity
first for people who want to write a lot
of emails and travel and write messages
and read documents on it
this phone is absolutely great and the
main reason why it's good at it is
because this has got a four thousand
milliamp battery which means that you're
probably gonna get more than two days of
battery out of this guy I've been using
it for more than a week and I've only
had to recharge it twice fully things
that I didn't like about it outside of
productivity this phone is just okay but
nothing spectacular the screen is a 5.5
inch display with Full HD resolution
which is okay but it's nothing special
the camera on the back is a 12 megapixel
shooter which is okay if you have good
lighting conditions but otherwise it's
just nothing special one last thing here
on the side you have all the buttons and
there are not two but three buttons one
is the volume rocker the second button
is the sleep/wake button and then
there's a third key which Blackberry
calls the convenience key which you can
remap to launch a particular app or take
particular action which is useful except
for the fact that you keep confusing it
with the sleepweight button you
constantly keep pressing the wrong
button
which is super annoying but this phone
never froze never got any particular bug
it was just fine this is the story of
the BlackBerry motion it's just an OK
phone a forgettable usable serviceable
phone nothing about it
you
